description: This 4f orbital is characterized by its complex, clover-shaped lobes with a distinct orientation, defined by the magnetic quantum number m_l = 2. This orientation shows a unique electron probability distribution pattern.
orientation: unique orientation with distinct electron probability distribution

nodes.orientation: specifically oriented planes through the nucleus
nodes.description: Planar nodes that segment the orbital into clover-shaped lobes, indicative of the m_l = 2 magnetic quantum number.
Radial nodes indicating zones of zero electron probability, characteristic of the 4f orbital's radial distribution.
